Author: mullwerf
Text: My mum is also a moved on and recovered anorexic and she was awful during my recovery (and triggered my ED). She is actually an amazing mum in almost every way except dealing with mental issues. She used to say really hurtful things towards me, like that I need to wear dresses that hide my legs etc. when I was recovering, And it absolutely killed me. She knew about my eating disorder. I never talked to her about how much it hurt me either. At the end of the day I had to learn to take my health into my own hands and just ignore her comments, and I encourage my sisters who have gone through/are going through similar comments to just ignore them and know that I am in the right direction whatever my mum says. Now 8 years later I'm essentially fully recovered, I'm "naturally skinny" with a BMI of 18 without restriction despite originally having gained some weight during the recovery due to how hard it is to go from eating nothing to eating normally.
